alert.note: Alert for Ionia (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 11:43AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of south central Michigan, including the following counties, Clinton, Eaton and Ionia. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Grand River near the ice jam is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1137 AM EST, Clinton County Central Dispatch reported an ice jam on the Grand River just downstream of where State Road crosses the Grand. Water has backed up behind this ice jam which has resulted in the flooding of State Road. In addition some homes were being threatened by rising water. Locations in and around this ice jam should be alert for possible flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Portland, Grand Ledge and Sebewa. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
